ext_description.p: This select is a place holder which extends the assignments of identification to elements of product data that can have aliases.

An Alias_identification is an additional identifier or name that is used to distinguish the object of interest in some different frame of reference. The scope of the frame of reference is specified as either an Organization, a Person Organization, or by a textual description of the type of alias.

An Alias_identification may be applied to a part definition, an organization, a file (also in the AIM an application context, an approval status, or a security classification level). This is not for the alias identification of people, dates, projects, or for version identification of parts and documents.
